1.0.name: wordpress/faq-shortcode
1.0.description:
write faq using the regular post interface you familir with, and use a simple shortcode to publish it where you want. you just need to put the shortcode where you want:

[faq]

or you can use one or all of three adittional parameters:

  • color (heading) - blue or #0000FF.
  • width - 300px (example).
  • publish order - ASC,DSC

default values are:

  • color - #EEEEEE
  • width - 600px
  • order - ASC. 
[faq width=200px color=red order=dsc]

for any question feel free to contact me here: http://wpcoder.co.il/contact-me.html
